body.p:
Mt Sterling Ky
7th Aug 66
S P Love
Col

Yrs of 30th ult to Dr Buford is before me. The Judgt against you is irregular & can be reversed -- I saw Leavy & he admits thus & will voluntarily set it aside & not trouble us to appeal -- it will then stand & be tried upon service of a summons on you to our Feby term -- If you can before that procure the arrest & of Bosquit -- you will get clear of all but costs & a minimal amt in the discretion of the Judge -- Can you do so -- if not I can arrange with Dury to get gov to remit all but his fee & he will remit $25 of that himself -- So that if you will send me a cheque for $7500 I will pay Dury & the costs & for my trouble & the costs are $10 or more & have it remitted & settled. Upon setting aside the Judgt and then will go on service of process & Gov cannot remit Durys part 30 per ct -- There is tno mistake the Judgt should be only for $250 Send me cheque forthwith or Dury
will not Stand to the arrangement unless he gets it Soon. Write whether this will suit or you had rather fight it or try & procure Bosquit attendance
